metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30586 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in dialog box handling in Windows in Google Chrome prior to92.0.4515.107 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to potentially exploit heap corruption via a craftedHTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
